website_summaries.verdict: A straight wall tent so big and roomy that it feels like a portable cabin.
pros: This tent has a hanging divider that splits it into separate rooms for privacy
It has a gear loft, lantern hook, storage pockets, access for electrical cords, and adjustable air vents to provide fresh air
cons: Some poles tend to break and zippers get stuck

customer_reviews.title: This tent was very comfortable and roomy
customer_reviews.text: This tent was very comfortable and roomy. It withstood 20-30 plus winds one night. It was easy to put up and take down. But the cord inside one of the roof supports snapped while taking the tent down. I tried to contact manufacturer for replacement but had to leave message and have not had a return call. I was able to restring it and tied a larger knot so it would not slip out.
customer_reviews.author: Francine young

customer_reviews.title: Need assistance to set up
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it has a great amount of space! It was more than plenty of room for our 2 dogs, my boyfriend, and myself. I’m knocking a star, because the bottom easily got some holes in it, so be sure your area is swept well and put a tarp down just in case! Nothing I can’t patch, but still, invest in a tarp as a buffer between your tent and the ground! Setting up is a multi-person job.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent. Good Price.
customer_reviews.text: Great tent, We just went to Acadia and the tent is very spacious, First night rained and the tent held up very well. Good material and well build. Highly recommend. Tarp is required to protect the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar DeSouza

customer_reviews.title: Survived a Nor' easter
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tent for a friend, we used it for a winter radio field day. Tent was left up for a week and survived a nor' easter, had to sweep the snow off so we could put it away. Very impressed with the durability of this tent.
customer_reviews.author: VerbalCVMA

customer_reviews.title: Lack of response and one minor issue.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy set-up. Only issue in two uses is that the ring to hold key (in corner) went from circle to an oval that is ambarely able to hold any longer. Notified company months ago. Have yet to hear back. Would have been 4 stars, but no response worries me more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Bertucci

customer_reviews.title: Great, roomy tent
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I wish the rain fly was a bit bigger as we've had very small amounts of rain making it's way into a couple spots. We had sideways rain and lots of wind, so all in all it held up well. Could use a few more interior pockets. Great, roomy tent.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent country house, very spacious, fit 8 people, super resistant to winds and showers, very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Gabriela Maestre

customer_reviews.title: Little house
customer_reviews.text: Just popped this baby up tonight for a weekend of camping. Basically looks as described very spacious I have two queen size air mattress inside and plenty of walk room all around. Easy to assemble took around 10 minutes. The only thing I wish was different was the zipper. You have to zip it all the way around and across the bottom of the entry. The white flaps get in the way and can get zipped up and stuck it not careful Other than that great purchase lovely color and pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia B

customer_reviews.title: Very large nice tent!
customer_reviews.text: Withstood 25 mph winds(with new long stakes purchased separately) and a light rain. Not so great at holding heat because of the mesh top. Overall very nice tent for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Steven foster

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material.  Great for a backyard only, but not real camping.
customer_reviews.text: A 10 knot wind had this tent crumpling due to the cheap, poorly placed poles. Don't trust this for any real camping. There were numerous tents setup on our trip and only ours, plus one other of the exact model, collapsed, while all others remained in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy quality!!??
customer_reviews.text: Not pleased. Set up the tent in our back yard and the eleastic in one of the poles snapped. Literally within an hour of unpacking the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great buy any family!
customer_reviews.text: For as massive as this thing is, it's really easy to set up (even with my 5'2" wife helping) but still suggest more than one person. The ceiling height is impressive (I'm 6'3" and can stand up right in it). The bottom is basically tarp material so I suggest using a tarp or other media to protect it. Easily fits a queen air mattress with room to spare for gear and a small table and chairs. Taking it down is just as easy, being rectangular in shape top an bottom makes getting it all back in the carry bag super easy. Held up to 30mph gusts and heavy rain for two days straight and took it like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Karl E.

customer_reviews.title: No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: This tent proved itself the very first night of camping! No kidding! Thank goodness we practice putting it up at home first. After running into many tent site problems at the state park. We put this up during a very short break in a heavy rain. Throwing everything inside because it was already getting late and the storm was getting worse. I was really worried this trip was not going to turn out good at all. No leaks at all! My husband was amazed as was I. We are in our late 50's and 60. This was our first tent camping trip after selling our 32ft RV... we love this tent!
customer_reviews.author: Diane little

customer_reviews.title: For a family it’s great it says it would sleep 10 which would be a stretch
customer_reviews.text: Started camping with our children this is our first tent and it’s great, very easy to put up and spacious inside.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!!! Great tent!! Super easy to setup. Holds up great to serve weather, mud and, wind.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Lantz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money tent
customer_reviews.text: Took this camping for the first time this past Memorial weekend in Oklahoma. It stood up well in the wind although we could have staked down better but didn’t have good enough stakes . Weather got rough rain and wind and some water got in I’m assuming through the air flow vents on the side of tent due to heavy wind . Over all it was very spacious for two people sharing it . Putting it up wasn’t too terribly time consuming. Easier with two people helping set up though personal.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Good tent for the summer and moderate wind
customer_reviews.text: Used Scotchgarde to seal seams and had no leakage. Used larger tent pegs and had not issues in moderate 25 mph wind.
customer_reviews.author: M. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Not at all water resistant. Had a light rain and the tent leaked through the walls and rain fly. I had to put a tarp over the top. My Coleman tent can sit in the pouring rain and not get a drop inside. If you live in the desert it might be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M

customer_reviews.title: Like a portable cabin!
customer_reviews.text: Great for standing up inside. The mesh pouch was strong enough to hold a hefty portable fan. Great quality all around! I recommend putting a tarp both underneath and inside the tent to keep the floor clean and dry.
customer_reviews.author: OlgaaglO

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to avoid hotels on road trips and will now start back camping. No more stooping and crawling while camping. Not sure how you would fit ten people inside but plenty of room for two to spread out and stay dry in the rain. We set this up right before a thunderstorm and it took a beating from the wind with no issues. It bends but it doesn't break and we had hours of 30 mph wind gusts. Even if it had failed I would not hesitate to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: William Angel

customer_reviews.title: Big and easy.
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy but easy to put up. I like the two doors.
customer_reviews.author: Skipperkeith

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, dry, and a great value!
customer_reviews.text: Used the Core 10 person tent for a month on the coast of Maine this summer. It weathered several rain days very well. It is dry and sturdy. The 10 person has plenty of room for a king air mattress, table for lamp, chair and gear for 2 (luggage). We previously had a Coleman tent that had a hinged velcro door that was very convenient which I missed. Overall very good purchase
customer_reviews.author: C. N. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Pole broke upon first set up
customer_reviews.text: I was almost done setting the tent up in my backyard just to check it out and make sure it was all there. When I heard a loud crack. One of the poles across the top split badly. It is unusable and I am returning it immediately. I camp every weekend for four months at a faire and I need something that is sturdy. When I can't even set it up once without it breaking that is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rene Hocker

customer_reviews.title: My wife want a tent she can stnd up in!
customer_reviews.text: I am stilll waiting for a heavy rain to see if it doesn't leak. You feel like you are sleeping in a big room instead ot the tent. The tent if for myself and my wife, but there is room for 8 with plenty of room to move about in. The tw doors allows for a traffic flow that does not require steeping over sleeping bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy 10 minute setup
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Given the size however, it only sleeps 6 "comfortably"
customer_reviews.author: Joel W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tent!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is AMAZING! it was worth every penny. The open ceiling is so cool and we were able to watch a meteor shower the one night. It has sooo much room. We had a queen size air mattress, two twin air mattresses, the dog bed and still tons of room that we could have added more people. My husband is 6'5" and could stand up no problem. There is a little part on the side where you can feed any extension cords through which was great and there were a couple nights that we had rain and the inside stayed dry. Pretty easy to assemble if you have 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this tent!
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using the same dome style tent for 15 years. It was great but finally wore out. We were looking for a cabin style tent so we could stand up inside and move around easier than before. This tent is so big it makes our queen size mattress seem small. Easy to set up, huge, nice bright colors and plenty of headroom to go around. Well worth the money. If I had to make a criticism, it would be that the zipper pulls are pretty small, larger would be easier to use but Id buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Nanko

customer_reviews.title: Dry! Spacey! Roomy!  AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: If you have set up smaller tents, then setting this up is the same thing, just heavier and bigger and takes a bit more coordination. The included tent bag is big enough to hold the tent mostly flat, but that won't get it back into the shipping box. But like my sleeping bags, I prefer to store my tents folded with a little fluff to them. First weekend out it rained, and thunder stormed. I did not apply any seam sealer or rain proofing and I stayed dry! It swallows a queen size mattress with room to spare! sorry for crappy night time picture.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy roomy tent! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to stand without crouching in this tent. It feels huge! Lots of windows and the air vents on the bottom of the tent give great air circulation! Did a trial run with it in the backyard and had a very windy rain storm. It held up without even rocking a bit and stayed nice and dry inside. We did have a couple tarps underneath just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amberlyengland

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry to say it didn’t hold up. It leaked terribly the first camping trip last summer. This summer the rain cover literally ripped in countless places because of some wind. The center pole snapped and splintered. I’m extremely disappointed. I bought this tent as an investment that would hopefully last at least 5 years. Just 2 camping trips and it barely made it. Pros: Spacious, easy to assemble (I can do it alone), attractive. I really wanted to love this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Long

customer_reviews.title: Bad a** tent-First use in a thunderstorm
customer_reviews.text: This tent sets up in fifteen minutes- with the stakes! Better quality than other big-name brands. First night and set up, there was a bad ass thunderstorm and the only Moisture came through the air vents at the bottom because the wind was blowing so much!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: There was no instructions how to put the tent together. It left you to figure it out. Tent pegs are cheap and bend easy. The only thing good was that it was a big tent.
customer_reviews.author: Island_Hospitality

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent is very easy to put up and take down. It held up well in rain and wind. It's very roomy and the room divider makes it easy for multiple people to use.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: I used this tent for a group of young women for a week. If it can stand up to them it could probably stand up to anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for families
customer_reviews.text: Great tent for a large family. Two large rooms. Easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Core tent 10X14
customer_reviews.text: I use this tent for living in for a month. Before the month was over the back door zipper would not close shut. I would use upper or lower zipper on that door and could get it to close but I could not use it again. Everything else about the tent was good except not in cold weather, too much wind would get in under the rain fly. There was some leakage from rain, but not too much.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review based on setup - has not bee used
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for an upcoming camping trip in October. We set it up today in our backyard to test it out. Sets up in under 20 min with 2 people. You will need 2 people. Sets up nicely. Roomy and airy. I would say it would sleep 6 comfortably with gear. Seems well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: John Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible tent, I used once and it leaked from all sides and from the roof. The lining on the zippers to keep it water proof started to peel off. Was easily knocked over by wind. Would never recommend this to anyone and very disappointed that I spent the amount of money i did on it, to use once. Was not able to return because we used for first time after return date allotted. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for! Good price for what it is!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet, so more review to come following the two festival events taking place later this year. Stay tuned! We did set this up in the yard and it seemed pretty easy once we got it up. Instructions are stuck to the inside of the bag, so there is that, but I guess you won't lose them this way!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett E

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really large tent. We used it for backpacking for months. The only complaint I have is that the zippers on the doors did not hold up well and started to fail after about a month of use. We managed and were able to use it still but the issues with the zippers were really annoying. It doesn't really hold up to high winds well but it is straight walled and we were kind of expecting that.
customer_reviews.author: CanadayVibes

customer_reviews.title: Loved ittttt , we feel in love with it
customer_reviews.text: When we openedthe tent i was a bit confussed , bit once we followed the insteuctions the tent was really easy to put up and take down, its really big , we put 4 twin airbeds and 2 flip chairs and we still had space to move around and store clothes inside, we feel in love with it and the color
customer_reviews.author: Rene Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: You’ll want this tent!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tent and y’all enough for me to stand (: didn’t leak while it monsooned during my festival. And comes with a patch if you get a cig burn or small hole in it. Awesome tent. Have 4 stars bc someone had to help me with setup but otherwise perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update : Tent material ripped on the second use.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Customer service said that they will replace the tent...... While setting up the tent for the second time, the material ripped while sliding the poles into place. Then the wind finished it off by making the hole larger. I ran my finger across the rip and it just shredded like paper. What a waste of money and my son is upset because camping is canceled. Tossed the whole ting in the dumpster. Lasted one year to the date.
customer_reviews.author: Torgo

customer_reviews.title: Large, and some privacy
customer_reviews.text: Very large tent. Family of 4 plus a dog. Leaving the top off allowed us to watch the night sky without bugs. The Vents on the side did a lot to keep it cool. And the privacy screen was adequate enough to allow us to change in tent without kicking everyone else out.
customer_reviews.author: K and D

customer_reviews.title: pole was frayed brand new out of box
customer_reviews.text: Went to assemble the tent a few days before we were to leave for our trip and one of the black roof tent poles was frayed and came apart as we were assembling the tent ... I have no idea if we can even go on our camping trip now - incredibly disappointed by the quality of this tent.
customer_reviews.author: JudithM

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy
customer_reviews.text: Used tent 4 times and a poll broke and got a hole it it
customer_reviews.author: Donna Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up with two people
customer_reviews.text: Have not tested it in bad weather but does well in Summer. Buy a large duffel bag to store it in instead of the bag it comes with and you will be happier. Ended up with a small hole in the floor after first trip but did not have another tarp on the ground to protect it. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Broken pole after first use
customer_reviews.text: The tent was great. It had everything I needed for our family of 4 (minus the cool auto-closing door). But after taking it down, on our first use the elastic in one of the poles snapped. I've been camping my entire life and know that this shouldn't happen on a first use. This is the first and last Core tent I will be buying.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal E.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible So Far....
customer_reviews.text: I really wouldn’t know if this is a good tent. I gave up trying to assemble it. There was a slight breeze and my wife and I couldn’t do it. We fought the wind (slight breeze) for 20 minutes and bailed. Really frustrating - thank god it was a dry run before our actual camping trip. I’ve been putting together tents for 20 plus years and never had issues like this - extremely bad instructions to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Awhip

customer_reviews.title: ITS MY Home
customer_reviews.text: I like the tent ,I live in a tent,its big I can stand any where inside.str. walls are great the zippers could be better. But its home and I like it alot.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Shields(Alaskamike)

customer_reviews.title: Core Support
customer_reviews.text: The support people at Core are a pleasure to work with. I bought the tent in March of 2019 and by the second use in Oct 2019 one of the metal ends of long ridge poles had come off. It probably wasn't glued on properly. As a result the carbon fiber end segment for that pole had split. I contacted the Core support people, explained the issue and sent them a picture of the damage. They sent out a replacement pole that day.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele S.

customer_reviews.title: Anchor Points not very strong
customer_reviews.text: I like the tent. It’s easy to setup for its size but one of the Anchor Point tabs which holds a one of the rods ripped off after 30 minutes of assembly. The ring on the end of the tab was also very weak and broke.
customer_reviews.author: marcel orun

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase. This tent is very sturdy and easy to assemble and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Realistically fits 6 or 7
customer_reviews.text: Realistically it fits like 6 fully grown adults but I’m sure if you really tried you could fit 10
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Family

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We love this tent! Awesome for families and camping with another couple.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F.

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness. We knew it was big, and had a practice run in our house. I guess we didn’t anticipate it being THIS big. It is awesome, well made, sturdy and just overall a nice tent.
customer_reviews.author: Ciotti Household

customer_reviews.title: Best tent I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Camped out in this thing for a solid week and I loved it. It was easy to assemble by myself and it was quite spacious
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car camping tent
customer_reviews.text: We love this tent! I'm 6'4" and can stand in the tent. Very easy and quick to put together. We were able to use a queen size air mattress and still move on both sides of the bed. It kept us dry during the rain and held up in the wind. Other people must not have put it together correctly if they say it isn't sturdy. This is a great tent for car camping or in your back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations for a tent.
customer_reviews.text: This tent held up pretty well in a T storm, wind 20 mph wind. Standing water didn’t soak through the floor after heavy rain. Didn’t find a single drop of rain in the tent, and I couldn’t have ask for a better price. I was able to fit 1 regular size cot, 1 XL cot, and a queen size air bed with no problem. Still had plenty of space to walk around and have 2 folding chairs inside to sit on. Setting up took me from 30-40 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Tou T.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble even by yourself!
customer_reviews.text: We love our tent!!!! I used it with the kids for a backyard camping adventure, and we had lots of fun! It drizzled a bit, but we were dry and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headline
customer_reviews.text: Could use better spikes, but over all very satisfied. Lived in it for 3 days out of the box. Survived dry through wind, rain, and mud.
customer_reviews.author: Pumba16b

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I was uncertain after reading some of the negative reviews, but I went for and man I am very happy. Easy to assemble, 15 minutes by myself out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Tinus

customer_reviews.title: Great family tent
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for our family of 5 with 2 dogs. Tall enough for tall adults to stand and move around comfortably. Good air circulation with all the windows and solid design.
customer_reviews.author: GARV

customer_reviews.title: Easy up and down assembly
customer_reviews.text: Just used over the weekend. Easy to assemble and perfectly ticks away in the bag without hassle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge tent!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome! It’s huge and the straight walls make such a difference. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tent!
customer_reviews.text: Got it on Friday, used it on Saturday kept us completely dry throughout a very heavy downpour that lasted well over 4.5hrs. Wow! So glad I went with this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Micho

customer_reviews.title: Great tent! 🏕
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my family and I am so happy I did! Plenty of space, plenty of height. Easy put up and take down. Used it on a dry warm night so am not sure on leakage. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: A C S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a family!
customer_reviews.text: Our family of 5 fit wonderfully in this, with plenty of room to spare! We had a queen air mattress, twin air mattress, and two pack n plays set up with no issue! Kids loved the fact that they could stare at the stars as well!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Great tent and very spacious.
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to assemble, however, I took stars for not providing a good instruction on how to assemble. It was hard to figure it out the instructions. It was easy if we just used common sense. I do love the fact that the instruction were attached to the case. Great tent, super spacious especially for only two, lol. It is tall, so it makes easy to walk.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Koscien

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 dogs. More than enough room! They loved it. I put cement bags in the corner to keep it from tilting in heavy winds and that works wonders. It stands against heavy rainstorms, no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. We are comping in Myrtle Beach. It has been raining for 3 nights in a row. Not a single drop inside. The air flow is great. The tent is very well engineered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible manual directions but once you figure if out its easy
customer_reviews.text: Great Tent. I thought parts were missing, but they are not,
customer_reviews.author: clavel

customer_reviews.title: Restocking fee
customer_reviews.text: We found a cheaper orange version but had to pay for shipping and a 20% restocking fee to return the original that we bought. The original never even made it out of the box. Tents probably great but awfully pricey to return. If it's not great this company doesn't try to make it right. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great size and setup
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for a family tent. The size is perfect especially for me giving my height. The first tent I could stand up in. Plenty of room for the family and all of our gear.
customer_reviews.author: Madone08

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: We just put it up and love it . It’s so big we have a family of 6 and we fit 3 queen air mattress in it .
customer_reviews.author: Amanda c.

customer_reviews.title: Would have been great!
customer_reviews.text: Really thought we loved this tent. Accurate space for our family and wasn't hard to figure out setup.. instructions are attached to bag. Didn't leak and it rained out entire trip. however upon leaving our 1st camp trip, we noticed the roof pole was split!! Could have collapsed on us and that is Not ok... See others have had this issue as well. Please fix this.. this would have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, large enough for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and it’s the biggest tent I’ve ever seen! We had 2 queen air mattresses and a dog kennel with enough room left for luggage and walking space. I love that there are openings on both sides. The divider offers only a little privacy as it doesn’t attach at very many points. The carry bag is actually large enough to easily fit the tent back inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I will be calling the company, our first use this past weekend on our annual float trip, our tent ripped in 3 places, at the bottom, where you attach the tent to the stakes. We are very unhappy with the quality and will be asking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: amanda morris

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this tent and our friends and family are jealous of it! Absolutely beautiful! Also held up great and did not have a drop of water after a torrential downpour! Great Great great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large standing room tent. Fast and easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: The tent was super easy to assemble. I would suggest 2 people though. Instructions were simple to follow. This tent is huge. Kept the cool in from the night, as it warmed up outside also. You can stand up in it just fine. I contemplated 5 different tents for 2 days, I'm so glad I went with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Danni E.

customer_reviews.title: Big.  Room to stand.
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. Zipper ok but not great. Moderate to set up but having 2 people better. Have to step on it it get it set up. Haven’t used in rain yet. Bungee on one of long roof piles snapped on first use. Not sure how seller is going to resolve...
customer_reviews.author: Jogues

customer_reviews.title: spacious
customer_reviews.text: This is a great family tent. Love the windows for air flow. Held up great to a storm. Love that there were two doors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BYO tent stakes
customer_reviews.text: This is a very roomy tent. I love the high ceilings. My only cons are (1) mine didn't come with tent stakes and (2) it definitely takes two people to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Friggin A +++++Tent!
customer_reviews.text: Our tent rocked!!!!!! Such space the excellent air flow made our sleeping out of this world!!!!! Will def buy again! Neighboring campers so jealous.. lol
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Spacious well built tent!
customer_reviews.text: Tent was out in rough weather in sustained high winds and heavy rains! Never leaked and held up to the high winds, some gusting to 60 mph.
customer_reviews.author: Cryteareon

customer_reviews.title: The top canopy does not withstand the sun well
customer_reviews.text: We use this a lot and the top canopy in the Florida sun has deteriorated to where it now rips easy. The sun can be brutal bit it should last longer than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Only used this once before the poles snapped also had tiny holes in it before we even got it set up for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki swindlehurst

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for a family of 5. More than enough room. Great for 6'5" husband to stand up in. Easy setup.
customer_reviews.author: Marckus Szymanowski

customer_reviews.title: Broke while putting it together
customer_reviews.text: Tent poles are made of cheap metal. Snapped in half while putting it together for the first time.. Don't spend your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Ashford

customer_reviews.title: Very good tent: recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this tent, especially for the price point. Seems reasonably well-built, and a great value
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tent!
customer_reviews.text: Not hard to set up. Straight walls with plenty of head room. (No crouching like with my old dome tent) This isn't light, so it wouldn't be good for back packing. Stayed completely dry in the rain. It is everything I wanted in my next tent.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy stay in it for two weeks without any problems. great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I can walk inside it!
customer_reviews.text: It's really great for my family. I just wish the pieces went together a little easier. And it stood strong in 20+ mph winds. Really happy about this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Olmstead

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for the family.
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. Plenty of space. The two doors are great. Love the air vents on the bottom. Didn’t get any water in the tent with a rain storm.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Hines

customer_reviews.title: Super tent.
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. love the feature with the two separate rooms. Great hight and overall size. Windows are well made. And great that you can open the windows, but keep the mosquito net closed.
customer_reviews.author: Anne DK

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Used for first time and bit leaked. Few days past return date so we are stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Need to buy a 2nd tent. One not enough.
customer_reviews.text: Tent was great. Easy to put up. Stood tall in lots of wind and was just enough room for us to enjoy our stay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this tent! I’ve been through and bunch of tents and this is by far the best one yet. Being able to stand up when you want to change is a hugeeee plus lol. It can get a bit cold but with extra blankets it’s fine! Set up is easy once you do it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Good tent
customer_reviews.text: First time campers and this tent was great for us. Went together easy enough, was sturdy. 2 rooms was nice. Good value comparatively. Good experience overall
customer_reviews.author: BlueHat

customer_reviews.title: Well made spacious tent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very roomy and awesome tent! My daughter and her friends have slumber parties in the back yard in it they like it so much! Very well made and you can freely move around without feeling crowded! So worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

product_meta.title: Core 10 Person Straight Wall Cabin Tent
feature_bullets: Sleeps 10 people; Fits two queen air mattresses; Center Height: 86"
CORE H20 Block Technology and adjustable ground vents
Included room divider creates a two room tent; Features front and back door access
Gear loft with lantern hook and pockets keep items organized and off the tent floor; Electrical cord access port (port is fully closable when not in use)
Includes tent, tent poles, rain fly, gear loft, room divider, tent stakes, expandable carry bag; 1 Year Limited Warranty

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
